mapper.select: SELECT A.DEPT_CODE , A.LECTURE_NO , B.PROF_NAME , A.LECTURE_NAME , A.CREDIT , A.CURR_NO , A.FULL_NO , A.DAY , A.TIME FROM LECTURE A JOIN PROFESSOR B ON A.PROF_NO = B.PROF_NO JOIN STUDENT C ON B.DEPT_CODE = C.DEPT_CODE WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ENROLLMENT VALUES (SEQ_ENROLL_ID, #{ studentNo }, #{ lectureNo })
mapper.select: SELECT LECTURE_NAME, PROF_NAME, STUDENT_NO, STUDENT_NAME, ATT_SCORE, ASS_SCORE, MID_SCORE, FIN_SCORE, GRADE FROM VIEW_GRADE_CHECK WHERE STUDENT_NO = #{ studentNo }
SELECT GRADE_NO, LECTURE_NO, PROF_NO, STUDENT_NO, ATT_SCORE, ASS_SCORE, MID_SCORE, FIN_SCORE, GRADE FROM GRADE WHERE PROF_NO = #{ profNo } AND LECTURE_NO = #{ lectureNo }
SELECT LECTURE_NO, DEPT_CODE, PROF_NO, LECTURE_NAME, CREDIT, CURR_NO, FULL_NO, DAY, TIME FROM LECTURE WHERE PROF_NO = #{profNo}
SELECT A.LECTURE_NO, A.STUDENT_NO FROM ENROLLMENT A JOIN LECTURE B ON A.LECTURE_NO = B.LECTURE_NO WHERE B.LECTURE_NO = #{ lectureNo } AND B.PROF_NO = #{ profNo }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GRADE ( GRADE_NO, LECTURE_NO, PROF_NO, STUDENT_NO, ATT_SCORE, ASS_SCORE MID_SCORE, FIN_SCORE, GRADE ) VALUES ( SEQ_GRADE_NO, #{ lectureNo }, #{ profNo }, #{ studentNo }, #{ attScore }, #{ assScore }, #{ midScore }, #{ finScore }, DEFAULT )
mapper.update: UPDATE GRADE A SET A.GRADE = (SELECT CASE WHEN B.ATT_SCORE < 7 THEN 'F' WHEN RANK() OVER(ORDER BY B.TOT_SCORE DESC) <= #{ currNo } * 0.05 THEN 'A+' WHEN RANK() OVER(ORDER BY B.TOT_SCORE DESC) <= #{ currNo } * 0.1 THEN 'A' WHEN RANK() OVER(ORDER BY B.TOT_SCORE DESC) <= #{ currNo } * 0.15 THEN 'B+' WHEN RANK() OVER(ORDER BY B.TOT_SCORE DESC) <= #{ currNo } * 0.2 THEN 'B' WHEN RANK() OVER(ORDER BY B.TOT_SCORE DESC) <= #{ currNo } * 0.25 THEN 'C+' WHEN RANK() OVER(ORDER BY B.TOT_SCORE DESC) <= #{ currNo } * 0.3 THEN 'C' WHEN RANK() OVER(ORDER BY B.TOT_SCORE DESC) <= #{ currNo } * 0.35 THEN 'D+' ELSE 'D' END; FROM VIEW_GRADE_CHECK B WHERE A.STUDENT_NO = B.STUDENT_NO) WHERE EXISTS(SELECT 0 FROM VIEW_GRADE_CHECK B WHERE A.STUDENT_NO = B.STUDENT_NO) AND A.LECTURE_NO = #{ lectureNo }
